charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] bumped into Red
talking to the Kanto Gym Leaders.
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_0401_0400_10: We were talking about Red and Pikachu.
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_0302_0500_10: Oh, is that your Pikachu, Red?
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_0402_0600_10:
Yeah! They’ve been together since they were
in Kanto!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_0700_10: They’ve fought our Pokémon in Gym battles.
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_0800_10:
Now that I think about it... You started your
journey in Pallet Town and used that Pikachu
in your battle against me.
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_0900_10: Did you meet him in Viridian Forest?
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_1000_10: Oh! That’s amazing! It must have been destiny!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_0401_1200_10:
I see you know your stuff, kid! As I would expect
from a Pikachu Trainer!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_0402_1400_10:
It’s very hard to find a Pikachu in Viridian
Forest! That’s a rare thing!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_1500_10:
I saw a little girl begging her dad for a Pikachu in
Pewter City...
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_1600_10: But it would be hard to find one nearby.
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_1700_10:
Anyway, I can’t believe the Pikachu who used to
struggle against my Onix has grown so strong!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_1900_10:
My water Pokémon were shown up by your
signature electric moves.
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_2000_10:
Even though I was so confident I wouldn’t lose
to such a flimsy Pokémon, with or without
disadvantage!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_2100_10: Its fight with my Raichu electrified both of us!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_2200_10:
I could see that Pikachu’s electricity sure is
powerful! It’s the real deal!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_2300_10:
So then you fought through the Pokémon League
with other Pokémon—and even discovered new 
powers here on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_0402_2700_10: Red and Pikachu can use max moves!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_2800_10: Also, I heard Red’s Pikachu can Gigantamax!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_2900_10: Gigantamax, huh. I heard about that from Nessa...
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_3000_10:
Even in the Galar region, Pokémon that can
Gigantamax are special.
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_3100_10:
How is it possible that a Pikachu from the Kanto
region can Gigantamax?
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_3200_10:
I guess there are still a lot of mysteries
about Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_3300_10:
We don’t know if Pikachu already had that power
buried inside him or if Red’s training was just
really good, but...
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_3400_10: It’s true that Red’s Pikachu has grown stronger!
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_3500_10:
As someone who used to battle against Red with
all my might...
charaepi_ch0000_10_red/2301_1201_3600_10:
I’d better work hard to not lose to you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], since you’ve also got
a Pikachu!
